job_title: Network Systems Integration Engineer - Data Center Hardware
job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsBS Degree in engineering with 4-8 years relevant work experienceStrong command of network design principles and engineering practices, including the implementation and management of core L2/L3, routing protocols, VLAN segmentation, and Quality of Service (QoS) in high-bandwidth Ethernet environments.
• Hands-on experience architecting and stress-testing high-performance, lossless fabrics.
• Proven ability to validate and benchmark network behavior, meticulously analyzing throughput, latency, and congestion patterns within complex, multi-rack deployments.
• Proficient in optimizing Linux systems through kernel tuning and NIC driver configuration.
• Leverages Python, Bash, and Ansible to automate infrastructure provisioning, configuration management, and validation workflows, enhancing efficiency and repeatability.
• Acknowledged for exceptional troubleshooting acumen, with a demonstrated ability to diagnose and resolve multifaceted performance, connectivity, and integration challenges by systematically isolating faults across the entire hardware and software stack.
